The video was published on Facebook on N: 2020, and has been shared more than 1,500 times.
The video: s Tamil-language caption translates to English as "Masha Allah, the scene shows discarding of items made in France, the country which insulted our loving prophet."
There were calls for a boycott of French: s criticism of Islamists following the beheading of a French teacher who showed cartoons of Prophet Mohammed.
A reverse image search using digital ver: Verify found that the footage actually shows spoiled chicken being discarded in Saudi Arabia in 2016. This was confirmed by comparing the footage to a YouTube video published on November 16, 2016, showing the same scene.
